Package net.sf.jameleon.plugin.selenium.tags

Class Summary
AbstractSeleniumGetStringFunctionTag An abstract class used to get some text and store the value in a provided context variable if one is defined.
AbstractSeleniumGetStringsFunctionTag An abstract class used to get multiple String values as a List and store them in the context.
AbstractSeleniumGetStringsWithLocatorFunctionTag An abstract class used to get multiple String values as a List and store them in the context.
AbstractSeleniumGetWithLocatorTag An abstract class to represent a tag which uses the locator and locatorType as defined in the Selenium docs to get a specified value and put it into the context.
AbstractSeleniumKeyActionTag An abstract tag used for the tags that do key actions.
AbstractSeleniumLocatorTag An abstract tag used for locator attributes.
AbstractSeleniumPatternTag An abstract tag used for pattern matching attributes.
AbstractSeleniumSelectTag An abstract tag used for select fields.
SeleniumAddSelectionTag Selects an option in a select field.
SeleniumAnswerOnNextPromptTag Answers the next prompt.
SeleniumAssertEditableTag Validates something is editable(not disabled).
SeleniumAssertElementPresentTag Validates an element exists on the current page.
SeleniumAssertFieldValueEqualsTag Validates a form field's value.
SeleniumAssertSomethingSelectedTag Validates something is selected in a drop-down("select") field.
SeleniumAssertTextPresentTag Validates text on the current page.
SeleniumAssertTitleEqualsTag Validates the Title.
SeleniumAssertVisibleTag Validates an element is visible.
SeleniumCheckTag Checks a radio button or checkbox.
SeleniumChooseCancelOnNextConfirmationTag Clicks the "cancel" button on the next instance of window.confirm().
SeleniumClickAtTag Clicks on an HTML element.
SeleniumClickTag Clicks on an HTML element.
SeleniumCloseTag Simulates the user clicking the "close" button in the titlebar of a popup.
SeleniumCreateCookieTag Creates a cookie.
SeleniumDeleteCookieTag Deletes a cookie with the specified name and (optionally) path.
SeleniumFireEventTag Fires off JavaScript events on a given HTML Element.
SeleniumGetAlertTag Gets the text of the current alert box and stores it in the defined context variable.
SeleniumGetAllButtonsTag Gets all of the page's buttons(type="text" only, currently).
SeleniumGetAllFieldsTag Gets all of the page's input fields (type="text" only, currently).
SeleniumGetAllLinksTag Gets all of the page's links.
SeleniumGetAllWindowIdsTag Gets the ids of all visible windows.
SeleniumGetAllWindowNamesTag Gets the names of all visible windows.
SeleniumGetAllWindowTitlesTag Gets the titles of all visible windows.
SeleniumGetAttributeFromAllWindowsTag Gets a specific attribute from all windows.
SeleniumGetAttributeTag Gets the value of the specified attribute on an element.
SeleniumGetConfirmationTag Gets string typed into the last confirmation dialog.
SeleniumGetCookieTag Gets all the cookies for the current page.
SeleniumGetElementHeightTag Gets height, in pixels, of an item.
SeleniumGetElementPositionLeftTag Gets the left position, in pixels, of an item.
SeleniumGetElementPositionTopTag Gets top position, in pixels, of an item.
SeleniumGetElementWidthTag Gets width, in pixels, of an item.
SeleniumGetEvalTag Gets the result of evaluating the specified JavaScript snippet.
SeleniumGetLocationTag Gets the URL location of the current browser.
SeleniumGetSelectedIdsTag Gets the selected ids of a select field.
SeleniumGetSelectedIdTag Gets the id of the selected item in a select field.
SeleniumGetSelectedIndexesTag Gets the selected indexes of a select field.
SeleniumGetSelectedIndexTag Gets the index of the selected item in a select field.
SeleniumGetSelectedLabelsTag Gets the selected labels of a select field.
SeleniumGetSelectedLabelTag Gets the label of the selected item in a select field.
SeleniumGetSelectedValuesTag Gets the values of the selected items of a select field.
SeleniumGetSelectedValueTag Gets the value of the selected item in a select field.
SeleniumGetSelectOptionsTag Gets the option labels of a select field.
SeleniumGetTextTag Gets the inner text of any HTML element.
SeleniumGetTitleTag Gets the title of the current page.
SeleniumGetValueTag Gets the value of a form field.
SeleniumGoBackTag Simulates the browser "back" button.
SeleniumKeyDownTag Simulates a user pressing a key (without releasing it yet).
SeleniumKeyPressTag Simulates a user pressing a key and releasing it.
SeleniumKeyUpTag Simulates a user releasing a key.
SeleniumMouseDownAtTag Simulates a user pressing the mouse button (without releasing it yet) on the specified element at a specific coordinate.
SeleniumMouseDownTag Simulates a user pressing the mouse button (without releasing it yet) on the specified element.
SeleniumMouseMoveAtTag Simulates a user moving the mouse over the specified element at a specific coordinate.
SeleniumMouseMoveTag Simulates a user moving the mouse over of the specified element.
SeleniumMouseOutTag Simulates a user moving the mouse out of the specified element.
SeleniumMouseOverTag Simulates a user hovering a mouse over the specified element.
SeleniumMouseUpAtTag Simulates a user releasing the mouse button on the specified element at a specific coordinate.
SeleniumMouseUpTag Simulates a user releasing the mouse button on the specified element.
SeleniumOpenTag Navigates the browser to the desired url.
SeleniumRefreshTag Simulates the browser "refresh" button.
SeleniumRemoveSelectionTag Unselects an option in a select field.
SeleniumSelectTag Selects an option in a select field.
SeleniumSelectWindowTag Selects a window.
SeleniumSubmitTag Submits a form.
SeleniumTypeTag Type text into form fields.
SeleniumUncheckTag Unchecks a radio button or checkbox.
SeleniumWaitForConditionTag Tries to validate a javascript condition during a certain amount of time.
SeleniumWaitForValueTag Continually tries to validate the text contents of a HTML element during a certain amount of time.
